552860.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #012: Nekh-ta-Nebi's Tomb (5E)
552860.description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 4 Level 5 PCs

This complex is set inside a small pyramid or ancient burial site, deep within the desert. It is home to the remains of Nekh-ta-Nebi, a minor nobleman whose lust for power maintains him and his dusty retinue, centuries after their unholy deaths.
5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
